document_data.name: Davy Jones
document_data.mainbody: '''Davy Jones''', born '''Reinhold William Rauschpautton''', was a [[wizard]] in the city of [[Ravens Bluff]] who operated a storage facility known as [[Davy Jones' Lock-Up|the Lock-Up]].
document_data.Description: Davy was a [[human]] man with short brown hair, brown eyes,{{Cite organized play/LC/A Wedding Summons in Ravens Bluff|4}}
document_data.Personality:
Davy was a very honorable man, having been trained in the ways of a [[knight]]. He spoke in a dignified manner and was given to writing in a formal style, though would try his best not to. He expected the lofty ideals of honor from all her interacted with, giving off a friendly demeanor with most of his customers, though especially towards women. He recognized not everyone in life was capable of being honorable, but felt such people were not worth his time. If anyone ever dishonored themselves in their dealings with him he would give them an opportunity to atone, though failure to do so could have severe consequences.

As a business owner he was rather efficient He was quite passionate about his business, preferring to let the warehouse burn down then to ever allow dishonorable hands take control of it.
document_data.Abilities:
As a wizard Davy knew the following [[spell]]s:
: ''[[armor (spell)|armor]]'', ''[[forget]]'', ''[[levitate]]'', ''[[light]]'', ''[[locate object]]'', ''[[magic mouth]]'', ''[[mending]]'', ''[[read magic]]'', ''[[sleep]]'', ''[[unseen servant]]'', and ''[[wizard lock]]''.

In terms of weaponry, Davy was only proficient in fighting with [[dagger]]s.
document_data.Possessions:
He typically dressed in clothing that was high quality, though functional.

Some of Davy's belongings were kept within one of the two-[[lock (item)|lock]] bins of his storage facility's high-security area. Within the office of the Lock-Up he kept around a handful of [[jar]]s of preserved hands from [[thieves]] who had tried to rob his business in the past.
document_data.Relationships: Many members of the [[City Watch (Ravens Bluff)|City Watch]] and [[Nightwatch]] were quite fond of Davy, due in part to his proclivity for buying off-duty officers [[ale]] on festival days.
document_data.History:
The past of Davy Jones was largely shrouded in mystery due to him being tight-lipped about it. He was born Reinhold William Rauschpautton in the {{YearlinkName|1328}}, in some land that was far south of Ravens Bluff. He was the third in line to inherit rule over a minor duchy in that land. He was raised with a courtier's education and trained in the ways of the [[knight]]. The eldest of his siblings, desiring no rival claimants to the Dukedom, gave him the ultimatum to be banished or suffer death.''Port of Ravens Bluff'' (pp. 42, 45) states that Charles O'Kane became Mayor 20 years ago, which would set it in 1361 DR.

Reinhold traveled around for a time, but came to find that he had little interest in being a roving [[adventurer]]. He eventually chose to settle down in anonymity in the city of Ravens Bluff, having his original name known by very few. There he worked as a dock worker for some time and he used the money he earned from that profession, plus his savings, to establish the storage facility Davy Jones' Lock-Up. It was during this time that Reinhold  became involved in [[arcane magic]], though he would keep largely private about his being a wizard.
